page.title: 09Ayrshire Arts Festival.
page.content: {Ayrshire Arts Festival}came into being in 1983. Funding is by ticket sales supported by sponsorship and a guaran_ tee against loss underwritten by the District Council. The Festival is thriving and box office receipts have covered costs to date. Liaison with Dumfries, Perth and Edinburgh Festivals enables performances to be made economically viable. 1985 being{International Youth Year special efforts were made to involve young people resulting in successful appearances by the{Junior Fiddle {Orchestra, Ayr Youth Jazz Orchestra, {and Ayr Youth Choir. }Future plans include the decoration of main thoro_ fares with hanging baskets and banners extension of the Art&Craft Exhibitions under the Festival umbrella and invol_ vement of outlying towns to make it a truly Ayrshire Festival.
